title: Nanoscale zero-valent iron composites for uranium-contaminated water treatment and environmental remediation: a review
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00613E, Perspective
Yinshan Zhu, Shusen Chen, Ziming Li, Hao Li, Muhammad Shaban, Changlun Chen
With the development of nuclear power and the nuclear industry, some uranium-containing wastewater will inevitably be released into the environment, which poses a threat to human health and the environment.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
